name: 蔡國隆
objective:
以 JavaScript 程式學各式 AI 影像辨識應用來實現機器學習，並使用 Python 編寫硬體控制板程式，將應用結合至感測器或實體輸出裝置，實現更完整的機器學習應用實例，建立解決問題的邏輯思維能力，瞭解背後原理與解決問題的邏輯思維。培養 STEM 跨領域整合的能力。結合經濟部工業局 iPAS 機械學習工程師訓練，並要求學生參加考試，取得相關證照。
Using AI image applications in JavaScript environment to achieve the learning of machine learning.  By using Python to write driving programs into hardware controller/board, the applications deal both of the sensor and hard-device output. These are aim to achieve more complete machine learning understanding. Through application examples, the establishment of the logical thinking ability on problem, STEM Cross-field Integration are achieved. Collaboration with iPAS machine learning engineers training of the Ministry of Economy/Industrial Bureau , the students are asked to participate in the examination and obtain the relevant license.
